column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Pulled pork hushpuppies (2.5/5): I appreciated the creativity with this dish. Instead of your standard hushpuppies
column2: these are hushpuppies on steroids that are stuffed with pulled pork. These oversized bad boys were pretty dry which took away from the dish. They do give you a dipping sauce
column4: but it was not enough to overcome the barren desert.
